structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases
Uniform Arbitration Act For Commercial Disputes

law.text: Upon the granting of an order confirming, modifying or correcting an award, judgment or decree shall be entered in conformity therewith and be enforced as any other judgment or decree. Costs of the application and of the proceedings subsequent thereto, and disbursements in connection therewith may be awarded by the court.
